version_description: ◯ Shape Tool added
Supports iOS10
Minor bugs fixed.

◯ New Multi Brushes have been added.
◯ New Cloud Brushes have been added.
◯ You can now set up more complex brushes.
◯ We have added Mesh Transform to the menu.
Minor bugs fixed.
Minor bugs fixed.
Minor bugs fixed.
- Minor bugs fixed and performance enhanced
- Minor bugs fixed
- Minor bugs fixed and performance enhanced
- Minor bugs fixed and performance enhanced
- Minor bugs fixed
New layer blending modes have been added! (Soft Light, Hard Light, Hue, Saturation, Color and Brightness.)
- Minor bugs fixed

- Compatible with iOS 11 now.
- Now supports the Retina display.
- Minor bugs fixed

- Added ON and OFF switch for Retina Display.
- Fixed minor bugs and improved performance.

- 对应iPhoneX
- 修正iOS11.1故障
- 修正轻微错误

- Mask and Stencil Layers have been added.
- Added a function that allows you to close gaps that occur in the Bucket and Magic Wand tools.
- You can now round the edges of text with the Text Tool.
- The blend mode Divide has been added.
- Minor bugs fixed

- Improvements made to logging in during maintenance.
- Minor bugs fixed.
- Minor bugs fixed

- Improvements made to logging in during maintenance.
- Minor bugs fixed.

- SonarPen is now supported.
- Fixed minor bugs and improved performance.
- Minor bugs fixed.
- Minor bugs fixed.
* Updated the design of the home screen.
- Fixed minor bugs and improved performance.
- Fixed minor bugs and improved performance.
Bug fix: “Remove Ads Add-on” does not work properly.
We have improved the drag and drop feature for the layers.
- Fixed minor bugs and improved performance.

- "Tone curve" function added. (It is a charged function)
- Added layer multiple selection function.(It is a charged function)
- now it is a keyword search for "cloud work".

- "Tone curve" function added.
- Added layer multiple selection function.
- now it is a keyword search for "cloud work".
- Fixed a bug in the "Brush tool" and "Paint Bucket tool".
Stability improved.

- Implementation of the "eyedropper tool" in the "long tap"
- Corresponding iOS11 of "tone curve"
- Fixed a minor bug.

Implement the font preview of "cloud text".
Improve the operation of long press dropper.
Fixed a minor bug.

The canvas angle and display magnification can be fixed.
Minor bugs fixed.
Fixed minor bugs

Projects created with "Manganame" can now be imported.
-Added the following filters:
-Custom noise
-Japanese patterns
-Chromatic aberration
-Concentrated lines
-Style Lines
-Uni Flash
-Images can be opened by drag and drop from other apps.
-Improved the operation of the text tool.
-When importing images from a camera, it is now possible to automatically crop and import them.
-Fixed some bugs.
Fixed an issue where the app does not work properly on iOS 13.1.
Minor bug fixes.

Enabled to export png / jpg from canvas.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.

- Fixed a bug that characters could not be seen on some screens.
- Fixed other minor bugs.
Added an unsharp mask.

- Added the function to apply directly to the illustration contest held on ART street.
- Added "Hide Panel" shortcut.
The "Color", "Layer" and "Brush" panels can now be hidden with a single tap.
- The font in the terminal can be used when inputting text. (※)
- Enhanced export function. (※)
"TIFF" "HEIF" "JP2" "GIF" "BMP" "WEBP" format can now be exported.
You can now specify detailed options when exporting "PNG", "JPEG", "PSD".
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
※ To use this function, "Remove-Ad Add-on" or "Creative Pack" is required.

-Fixed a bug that text edges were cut off.
-Fixed a bug where layers were combined when importing a PSD file.
-Fixed minor bugs.
Fixed a bug that My Gallery works are not displayed.

Addressed an issue where users could not log in with iOS13.3.1.
If login fails,Please log in from "If you can not log in, tap here" at the bottom of the screen.

The color palette can be rearranged.
Added "Motion Blur" and "Lens Blur" to the filter.
Minor improvements and bug fixes.

Added the function to not display ads to users who have met the conditions.
Made minor improvements and bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Fixed a few bugs.
The transformation tool has been improved to allow for fine tuning.

Fixed a problem that kept moving down when pressing the fine adjustment button on the Transform tool.
You can now use the intra-device font with the text tool offline.

ver.22.4
○Fixed a login issue.
○Added the function to adjust the touch position of the stylus.
○Fixed minor bugs.
Maximum brush size – 500px.

○Fixed a bug in iOS14.
○Fixed a bug that two-finger operation does not work due to some operations.
○Fixed minor bugs.

○Addition of function to display notifications about apps
○Fixed an issue where local fonts could not be used on iOS14
○Fixed minor bugs.

ver.22.8
○Fixed minor bugs.

○Fixed a bug in iOS14.
○Fixed a bug that two-finger operation does not work due to some operations.
○Fixed minor bugs.
Fixed a bug that prevented the app from launching on iOS 13 and below.

We have released a new service called “MediBang Library”.
It allows you to download a variety of content that can be used with this application.
